content: And as weâve seen from major pharmaceutical companies coming to us, major medical device companies coming to us and integrated health networks like Novant Health coming to us, they are very much excited about the fact that we have a medical device and they really do see this as almost table stakes to be able to use a product like this in their processes, whether it is direct for patient care in the case of an integrated health network or whether itâs for the purposes, for example, of conducting a clinical trial or post-market surveillance for a big pharma company.
